title: HELP
body: Im traying to update my client but dosent work stuck at 33% tried to restart nothing steel 33%{{champion:141}}

replies.body: From 0% to about 33% the patcher is mostly scanning game files to prepare for the patch file updates. If you keep getting stuck in that section, it's likely due to the patcher not having all of the admin permissions it needs to scan those files. Run through our [**permissions guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) really quick, and let me know if that helps!
